Financial Technology & Automated Investing¶

Portfolio managers develop asset management models based on age, income, time to retirement, etc. They then plug your variables into their model to determine your so-called individualized portfolio.

Financial Technology¶

Financial technology, also known as Fintech, is a rapidly developing industry in which traditional banking, investing, and money management is moving to digital platforms.

Automated Investing¶

Automated investing is the use of digital platforms to make pre-programmed investing and trading decisions for customers based on algorithms and variables from the user such as age, income, goals, and risk tolerance.

Contents:

  • 1. 5 Popular Robo-Advisors
    • 1.1. Growth in Robo-Advisors
    • 1.2. How Robo-Advisors Work
    • 1.3. Why Use a Robo-Advisor?
    • 1.4. The Bottom Line

Blockchain Technology¶

Blockchain creates a faster, more efficient way for businesses to transmit, receive, and track orders using secure data. It is the foundation of cryptocurrency trading and is moving into regulated industries such as banking and auctions.
